name: palserver-manager
description: A Palworld server manager to auto manage your server

scripts.build: tsc --outDir ./out && pkg -t node18-win-x64 ./out/src/data/index.js -o ./FilterLogs.exe && copyfiles -u 0 src/ui/html/* out/ && copyfiles -u 0 src/ui/css/* out/ && copyfiles -u 0 src/ui/images/* out/
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags

author: Matthew Manka
